_header: May no man sleep in your hall

CULAdd5943.First Lines:
May no man sher slepe in ȝoure hallefor &
                    dogges madame for dogges madambut ȝyf he haue a ten tent of xv
                    ynsheWith twey clogges madame…
CULAdd5943.Last Lines:
…by tuyne my lady thyesto dryve a wey the flyes
                    madame
